Name: ResponseUnit
Description: Identifies the intended Response unit (respondent). Supports the use of an external controlled vocabulary.

Name: AnalysisUnit
Description: The analysis unit, expressed as a term which may come from a controlled vocabulary.

Name: UniverseReference
Description: Reference to the universe statement containing a description of the persons or other elements that this measurement refers to.

Name: EstimatedSecondsResponseTime
Description: The estimated amount of time required to perform the data capture expressed in seconds. Decimal values should be used to define fractions of seconds. At the measurement construct level it refers to the estimated time within the context of is use in a data capture process.
